bugs.summary: Perma TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | dom/tests/mochitest/general/test_interfaces.html | If this is failing: DANGER, are you sure you want to expose the new interface EncodedVideoChunk to all webpages as a property on when Gecko 131 merges to beta on 2024-09-02
Remove layout.css.inline-style-caching.always-enabled pref
Implement parsing of CSS '@position-try' rule
Reject `!important` declaration for `@position-try` like `@keyframes` does
nsNodeInfoManager::NodeInfoCache doesn't check hashes before performing deep string comparison
Copy and Paste context menu entries are sometimes disabled when they should not be
Don't use UTS 46 ToUnicode from nsDocShell::AttemptURIFixup
Add telemetry probes for fetch keepalive
Consider capturing profiles using signals for timed out tests in CI
Use D3D11VideoProcessor for color conversion in DXGITextureHostD3D11::GetAsSurfaceWithDevice()
Use GpuProcessTextureId in D3D11TextureData if compositor device is used
Remove unused mTransformInDevSpace member from AnimationTransform struct
DCLayerTree is color-managing videos, even if they don't need to be
Update using bytecode to handle `await using`
Rename js::StringBuffer
Dispose Resources should handle async function returns correctly
Implement the CSSPositionTryRule interface
Fix up missed renaming from `position-try-options` to `position-try-fallbacks`
Do not add emphasis to punctuation marks
More shortcuts triggering and hiding improvements
With RFP, a granted Canvas Permission still applies FPP's randomization
Update tracking lists documentation on shavar deprecation
Make Document::RequestStorageAccess e10s aware
Crash in [@ mozilla::gmp::GMPLoader::Load] (Updated Widevine plugin 4.10.2830.0)
Cover temporary storage initialization in OpenStorageDirectory and OpenClientDirectory
CSS variable tooltip should have a smaller max width
Add MDN link for Priority header
fix repackage-snap python import to avoid doc warning
Enable microsurvey by default
Pick up some minor AndroidX dependency updates
Update android nightly application-services version bump to new version 016192965413b7d38c76d24f25560d5222bb0b18 from 2024-08-14 05:02:38
Create a new Tier 1 Task for a small subset of smoke-tests
Remove all instances of onLegacyEngagement()
Set up a helper to invoke JS modules via the category manager
Start using the category manager for consumers to hook into browser window `delayed-startup`
Add new set-fallback method to intl.ui.browserLanguage telemetry action
Tab hover preview has a placeholder even when the image preview is disabled
Collapsing tab group with selected tab changes the selected tab to a non-grouped tab, creating a new one if none exists
Replace hardcoded support URL in login-alert with moz-support-link
Move MOZ_OPTIMIZE_FLAGS from old-configure to moz.configure
[Megalist] Establish more options menu
